General.Name: Dahu Aquaculture Co Ltd
General.Description: Dahu Aquaculture Co.,Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the breeding, processing, sales, and trade of freshwater fish and related aquatic products in China. The company offers bighead carp, soft-shelled turtle, turtle, and hairy crabs under the Dahu brand name; flavored sauce and liquor under the Deshan brand name; and ammonia sugar pearl powder chips, pearl products, etc. under the Dongting brand name. It also produces and sells liquor products. In addition, the company offers healthy ingredients and products, as well as rehabilitation, nursing, health, and medical care services. Dahu Aquaculture Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1999 and is based in Changde, China.
